website_summaries.verdict: This laptop looks great, but it also gives you a high level of performance that’s appropriate for almost any kind of work you need to do.
pros: With an Intel Core i7 processor, this laptop has plenty of processing power
Gives you quite a bit of storage space with both a large SSD and HDD
cons: May run hot during long sessions

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time and money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this laptop 1 month ago. It already started having display issues. Do not waste your time on this laptop. Sending it in for repair, nothing is guaranteed. I am a student and this repair is gonna take over 2 weeks. It is an absolute waste of your money and time. Honestly just buy a Dell or a Mac. Please don't even waste your time.
customer_reviews.author: Vadana

customer_reviews.title: 15 second start up
customer_reviews.text: I got this to replace my 10 year old laptop that died suddenly. I was worried that because I pick this so hastily that it would not be what I wanted. However I have been pleasantly surprised. Windows is saved on the solid state drive so the laptop boots up in about 15 seconds. I only use it for basic stuff like spreadsheets and logging in to work but has been wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Secondary Drive Failure
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this laptop to serve as my main computer for the next couple of years..didn’t make it to week three. Tried to unlock the secondary hard drive from Bitlocker and the hard drive just imploded with scraping noises. Luckily after leaving it to scrape for a good 10 mins, the SSD shut out the secondary and booted without it, but I still lost my work and homework from the last three weeks 😫😖 I am returning it for a new one, but not feeling very confident in this model.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop
customer_reviews.text: This is the best laptop I have ever owned. My brother is a gamer and he helped me choose this out and he said this was the best one on amazon. I definetly agree. Super fast and light weight. Battery life is normal and I love the back-lit keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: MaKenzie Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: So far I love the computer the only thing is the battery but in general I am very happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: va

customer_reviews.title: Happy mom
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my son at college. He told me it’s fast, light, and perfect for now
customer_reviews.author: charlene Ann Utt

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. It runs fast, large screen, doesn’t come with windows, but otherwise it’s a great working laptop.
customer_reviews.author: MegRN

customer_reviews.title: Nice computer
customer_reviews.text: Was a very nice looking computer. It just didn't have all the features that I need.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa D. Garnes

customer_reviews.title: Always get i7 processor, anything lower isn’t worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice laptop. Fast, good screen quality, compact, light, and capable of getting the job done. Only bad part is that the speaker is at the bottom of the computer. Otherwise, it’s pretty amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas K.

customer_reviews.title: Recommended for travel and high performance
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. It's compact and also good choice who want to travel and also want to high performance laptop
customer_reviews.author: teguh

customer_reviews.title: I think it is worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I like the weight and how fast the computer is and the only thing I don't like is how light colored the keyboard characters.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer T. Hancock

product_meta.title: Asus Vivobook S15 S512 Thin and Light 15.6” FHD, Intel Core i7-8565U CPU, 8GB DDR4 RAM, 256GB PCIe Nvme SSD + 1TB HDD, Windows 10 Home, S512FA-DB71, Silver Metal
product_meta.description: Style:Intel Core i7-8565UWhether at work or play, Asus VivoBook S15 is the compact laptop that immerses you in whatever you set out to do. Its new Frameless four-sided NanoEdge display boasts an ultra slim 5.7mm bezel, giving an amazing 88% screen-to-body ratio for supremely immersive visuals. The ErgoLift hinge design also tilts The keyboard up for more comfortable typing. Vivobook S15 is powered by up to an Intel Core i7 processor to help you get things done with the least amount of fuss. The actual transfer speed of USB 3.0, 3.1 (Gen 1 and 2), and/or Type-C will vary depending on many factors including the processing speed of the host device, file attributes and other factors related to system configuration and your operating environment.
feature_bullets: 15.6 inch Full HD 4 Way NanoEdge bezel Display with stunning 87% screen-to-body ratio
Powerful Intel Core i7-8565u Processor (8M Cache, up to 4.6 GHz)
8GB DDR4 RAM and 256GB PCIe NVMe SSD + 1TB HDD and Windows 10 Home
Ergonomic backlit chiclet keyboard with fingerprint sensor activated via Windows Hello
Exclusive ErgoLift keyboard design for improved typing position
Comprehensive connections including USB 3.1 Type-C, USB 3.1 Type-A, USB 2.0, and HDMI; Wi-Fi 5/802.11AC Wi-Fi (*usb transfer speed may vary. Learn more at Asus website)
